pageProps.title: About the blog
pageProps.body:
I feel that tutorials are great, but building projects is the best way to learn.  I could have created this blog using wordpress or jekyll. Instead, I  built the blog [from scratch][3] as a learning project. I can now learn from tutorials and apply it to the blog. The blog project can be a journal of the learnings as well. Also, nothing beats the joy of making things work with code! 

In my quest to learn, I use tools and tech that this simple blog site does not need. Hence, this site is definitely, going to be "__over-engineered__".

The blogs by [ponyfoo][4] and [jlongster][5] were inspirations behind this.

[1]: https://github.com/anuragashok "Anurag Ashok"
[2]: https://medium.com/swlh/the-beginning-of-everything-as-code-a25c4e9a75e9 "everything as code"
[3]: https://theoverengineered.blog/posts/initial-post "Intial Post - How the blog started"
[4]: https://ponyfoo.com/articles/most-over-engineered-blog-ever
[5]: https://jlongster.com/Presenting-The-Most-Over-Engineered-Blog-Ever
[6]: https://www.linkedin.com/in/anurag-ashok/
